# init(from:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance of the conforming type from a data value.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(from dataValue: MLDataValue)
```

## Converting from a data value to a type’s instance

- **init()**: Creates a new default instance of the conforming type when a data value is missing or invalid.
